import sys

n, a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

n -= 1

print(n // (a + b) * a + min(n % (a + b), a)) 

# input
N, A, B = map(int, input().split())

# output
print(N//(A+B)*A+min(N%(A+B), A))
